title.title: Website title, used as header default title and meta title.

description.default: The best place to start your documentation.

socials.title: Social links
socials.description: Will be used in AppSocialIcons component.

level.title: Aside navigation level
level.description: Use 0 to disable all nesting. Use 1 and more to display nested navigation in header and aside navigation.

collapsed.title: Specify if default collapsibles state globally for aside navigation.

exclude.title: Paths to be excluded from aside navigation.

title.title: Website title
title.description:
Title to be displayed in header or as aria-label if logo is defined.
Default to docus.title

logo.title: Logo configuration
logo.description:
Boolean to disable or use the `Logo.vue` component.
String to be used as a name of a component.

showLinkIcon.title: Header links
showLinkIcon.description: Toggle links icons in the header.

exclude.title: Paths to be excluded from header links.

fixed.title: Sets the header to fixed or static mode.

fluid.title: Makes the content of the header fluid.
Makes the content of the main container fluid.

padded.title: Makes the content of the main container padded.

textLinks.title: Text links
textLinks.description: Will be added into center section of the footer.

href.description: Link when clicking on the icon

fluid.title: Makes the content of the footer fluid.

props.name: branch
props.description: The branch to use for the edit link.

props.name: dir
props.description:
A base directory to append to the source path.

Won't be used if `page` is set.

props.name: source
props.description:
Source file path.

Won't be used if `page` is set.
